p: On the contrary, some studies report a low to moderate content of this oxygenated monoterpene (2.3–21.3%) [ 29, 30] and a higher expression of piperitone, ranging from 0.1 to 38.0% [ 7, 29, 31], without reaching, however, the values found in the present study for MPLII and MPLIII as well as for MPFII and MPFIII EOs (piperitone ≥ 80.3%).
